thmuggleton.model

Interface Match

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatchImpl

    public interface Match
    Defines an interface to interact with a model object representing a bowling match.
    Author:
    Thomas Muggleton

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(ChangeListener listener)
      Adds a change listener to this Match which will be informed of change events.
      void addPlayer(String playerName)
      Adds a new player to the match.
      boolean addScore(int score)
      Adds the next score in the match.
      void clear()
      Clears the existing data from this match.
      Frame[] getFrames(String playerName)
      Returns an array of frames for a given player.
      Set<String> getLeaders()
      Returns the player(s) with the highest score in the match.
      int getTotalScore(String playerName)
      Returns the total score for the given player.
      boolean isFinished()
      Returns if all players in this match have recorded scores for all of their frames.

        Returns:
